And Then Everything was just SORTED

Gardyloo GardyLoo! Lmao well! Hmm not really. So I did take a day-break from my mobile-phone. In fact I used to do this a year before quite frequently while preparing, so coming to the main topic today I just passed a year from the day everything got sorted after a long chaos. Yep on 27th May I gave my historical JEE ADV LOl. And I am not gonna talk about my jee from now, ofc today I will. Hmm i do imagine sometimes what would have happenedin case I didnt make it this time too well i would have been broken completely from the inside out. aaj mereko daant pad gayi mehul se :/ kaaam hi aisa kiya maine. Jira cloud pe 5 logo ko invite bhej diyaa .-. paid hota hai voh lmao Mehul ke paas 120$ ka bill agaya. 😬 Koi nahi in the end it was all sorted out as I said I just sorted everything today :p Ab sab sorted hai finally. A day away from phone and people provides you much much time to think and act accordingly. So, final plan is somewhat like i am going to finish a 4 week project in coming 3 days and will be finishing MissionED app project by the coming week. Finally i will be left with IITD marketplace and creato voh chalta rahega marketplace is chill. Om bhi hai usme and Creato toh khair hai hi baseline. Best decision of my life i would say. At times I think of leaving it but end up seeing all the things it does have to offer. Kaafi nice.

Workload Intensifies

Today I as usual woke up early and was watching 13 reasons why while working on mission ED App. Almost ready it is and I am so happy it can be said as my first "Android" App. Itni Khushi Itni Khushi baba reh. XD Coming to the intersting part I watched a man stealing our plant pots kept in front of the house. He hads done it twice. I am thiking to upload his video on YouTube Lets see kitne views aatein hai. Hmm In am in a dilemma here, well tbh when I tracked that man for his info and well it was pretty hard to do so because yk he is a common man with not much social activity ofcourse. What do you expect from a man who steal plant pots from the road. Haan so finally got his complete details with address and name and everything possible through his Activa Scooter Number Plate. HAHAHA *devilish laughs* Though I havent done anything yet because he is from a dangerous area and I cant risk anything doing myself plus mera kya hi jaa raha papa ke gamle thei voh lol. Well, anyone can be a thief and anyone can do bad deeds pretty rich and upper caste people too do wrong things but the dilemma I am here is whether I should hate such people who are who are already getting so much for free from the government and still abuses them side by side doing things like this. Also, people who supports Pakistan in an India Pak match who does pretty wrong things in the name of religion and ofcourse they got many saviours too. KUNAL i dont think you would ever read this blog tho. But seriously dude I can be unaware of many things but on this I am damn sure that you are asshole. coming back to dilemma the dilemma is whether I sholud hate such people who does things like this and those who are bad for the nation and society or I should have mercy upon myself who being from the caste which gets nothing for free from the governament has to work hard to get everything umm or I should just be like " Youtube pe upload kardunga dekhte ahai kitne views aatei hai , papa ke gamle thei mereko kya hai LMAO" yk just leave it attitude. When the holy cows are slaughtered in the holy month of Ramzan should I be hurt or should I just scroll my google/instagram feed up. I need to know how should i feel because that is also now governed by society these days. How one should feel and react. Well most of the time was spent on working on the app, thode dino baad launching hai. let's see kya hota hai. :// Basically its the dilemma of should i just go with the flow or should I do something to break the flow. or maybe i am just unaware / blinded to some other things I should know before worrying over all this.

A Busy Day

Another cyclone might hit the shores of Orissa. Sad right! Yeah well one can say 2020 is cursed infact people are already saying that so let's not follow the crowd and rather say "Try to play the orchestra". Lmao, Context... Haan well who knows maybe I too forget what this line was all about isliye hi toh ye blog hai 💁As an escape to the biji schedule and spend my #metime. So this is a line from Steve Job's movie cum documentory in which he tells Steve Wozniak, "You may be the best Musician in your line but I, I am the one who plays Orchestra". Cool right? True too. I dont know how to relate this to the modern world scenario maybe I haven't experienced it yet... But it gives me Goosebumps each time I think about it. another imp concern of the hour QuaranTeach, Umm so far so good but what to do next?? I am open to suggestions about this please. Book bhi padhni hai kabse hi standy pe hai. I so want to read books and novels but idk why I feel that there are more important things to do than that.     An Embarassing Day

    Well, the day was going great untill one of the most embarassing things happened to me, and I had nothing to do with it but in the end it was me who ended up getting up embarassed. So, the thing was... I uploaded the poster for QuaranTeach on instagram made by Sahil. Updated the Bio and the response of the page was coming pretty nice untill.. one of the core member of CovEd texts a Hi! okay i got excited TBH as one of the similar organisation was texting, and maybe they might be having plans of collab and stuff, so according to him the content written in the poster was copied from one of the poster of CovEd. He said "I appreciate the initiative by you BUT 'PLEASE DO NOT COPY'. Well I was kind of busy and didnt even read what was in the poster and turns out he was totally right :( I became both super furious and embarassed, side by side several people started texting QuaranTeach mentors about the copied content :/. I didnt had to do anything with me but in the end it was me who had to face embarassment of someone else's stupidity.

    #Musings 01 Perspective and People

    I guess I have been messing up with the time a lot lately, like both CreatoSpace and MissionED are big projects and I haven't made any significant progress in CreatoSpace since long. Plus I dont like it when the people are on low enthu, "People" right here the things go wrong when you start to get affected how and what people are doing around you. Well, 'Perspective' is another word to ponder about atleast for me! I have been lately looking things through the 'perspective' of the one who I have been talking to too. LOL, pros and cons exist here too. ._. Maybe, the 'people' I have met in my past have made me so... like this "ALL MESSED UP". Pondering about small things and not letting go full of myself. Well, long story I guess. Let's leave it for later.
